law.catch_line: To ensure the prompt payment of interest and provision for the payment of the principal on bonds iss...
law.text:
To ensure the prompt payment of interest and provision for the payment of the principal on bonds issued under this subtitle:
the prompt and proper performance of the acts required under §§ 22-106 and 22-108 of this subtitle is specially enjoined; and
a person who is required to act under §§ 22-106 and 22-108 of this subtitle:
shall perform the acts required under those sections;
shall pay over any funds as required under those sections; and
may not use any part of the funds for any other purpose than for the payment of principal and interest on the bonds.
